alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Edgefield; Lexington; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:48AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, east central Edgefield, Lexington, northeastern Aiken, southeastern Saluda and central Richland Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1048 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aiken Municipal Airport to near Horrel Hill. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Batesburg-Leesville, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, McEntire Air Base, Red Bank, Johnston, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Eastover, Ridge Spring and Sesquicentennial State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 20 and 83. Interstate 26 between mile markers 106 and 127. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Calhoun; Edgefield; Lexington; Richland; Saluda
